Uses of Class
toxi.color.TColor

  • Packages that use TColor 
    Package Description
    toxi.color  

    • Uses of TColor in toxi.color

      Methods in toxi.color that return TColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TColor TColor.add(TColor c) 
      TColor TColor.addSelf(TColor c) 
      TColor TColor.adjustConstrast(float amount)
      Changes the brightness of the color by the given amount in the direction towards either the black or white point (depending on if current brightness >= 50%)
      TColor TColor.adjustHSV(float h, float s, float v)
      Adds the given HSV values as offsets to the current color.
      TColor TColor.adjustRGB(float r, float g, float b)
      Adds the given RGB values as offsets to the current color.
      TColor TColor.analog(float theta, float delta)
      Rotates this color by a random amount (not exceeding the one specified) and creates variations in saturation and brightness based on the 2nd parameter.
      TColor TColor.analog(int angle, float delta) 
      TColor TColor.blend(ReadonlyTColor c, float t)
      Blends the color with the given one by the stated amount
      TColor TColor.complement() 
      TColor TColor.copy() 
      TColor ReadonlyTColor.copy() 
      TColor TColor.darken(float step)
      Reduces the color's brightness by the given amount (e.g 0.1 = 10% darker).
      TColor TColor.desaturate(float step)
      Reduced the color's saturation by the given amount.

      ColorList ColorList.addAll(java.util.Collection<TColor> collection)
      Adds all entries of the TColor collection to the list (shallow copy only, manipulating the new list will modify the original colors).
